title: GraphQL API
description: Build complete GraphQL API with resolvers
prompt:
Create a complete GraphQL API for [DOMAIN]:

Requirements:
1. Schema design (types, interfaces, enums)
2. Queries with pagination, filtering, sorting
3. Mutations (create, update, delete)
4. Subscriptions for real-time updates
5. Resolvers with DataLoader
6. Performance optimization
7. Security (authentication, authorization)
8. Testing suite
9. Documentation

Technology: [Apollo Server/etc.]
Provide production-ready code.
example: Create GraphQL API for social media platform
